oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Iron-Catalyzed Regioselective Direct Arylation at the C-3 Position of N-Alky1-2-pyridone
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: MODAK, A
RANA, S
MAITI, D
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: ARYLBORONIC ACIDS
HETEROAROMATIC BASES
DIRECT ALKYLATION
2-PYRIDONES
DERIVATIVES
BENZOFUROQUINOLINES
PEROXYDISULFATE
ALKENYLATION
HETEROARENES
HETEROCYCLES
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A number of pharmaceutical compounds possess an arylated 2-pyridone moiety. The existing reports using expensive starting materials and/or superstoichiometric metal salts have prompted us to explore a possible user-friendly method for their synthesis. In this report, we demonstrate an easy-to-handle reaction condition with an iron catalyst for the exclusive generation of C-3-arylated pyridone via C-H functionalization.
